data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Kukës, Albania that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kukës, Albania
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Kukës, Albania a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Kukës, Albania humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Kukës.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Egyptian, Balkan people.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Kukës, Albania.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Kukës, Albania the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kukës, Albania has a population of 85,300.

We estimate Kukës has 516 people who might know Jesus, 28,180 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 56,604 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 165 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Kukës you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.
